attributes.action: Keep schools,colleges & universities closed in the New Year until end of spring.
attributes.additional_details: Protect the NHS, and save lives.
attributes.background: Scientists and the government believed that groups of people indoors increased transmission of the virus months ago. Now that there is a new strain which is even more contagious, surely the sensible thing to do is to shut schools, colleges & universities now to prevent further transmission?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for university campuses to be closed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512

Since you started your petition the Government has announced that primary schools, secondary schools and colleges across England must move to remote provision from 5 January 2021, except for vulnerable children and the children of key workers.

You can read the Prime Minister's announcement of new Covid-19 restrictions, including school closures, here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
